title: business-to-business and business-to-customer exhibitions where products, machinery, art, skills, services, activities etc
clause_text: business-to-business and business-to-customer exhibitions where products, machinery, art, skills, services, activities etc. are displayed on temporary or permanent basis; and
section: 33 (22) Regulation for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centers in MCGM Area

source_pdf.text_snippet: business-to-business and business-to-customer exhibitions where products, machinery, art, skills, services, activities etc. are displayed on temporary or permanent basis; and
